name: EchBay Tag Manager
author: Dao Quoc Dai

sections.description: Control tags manager same same google tag manager. Easily setup Facebook pixel or Google Conversion tracking and add another Javascript code, CSS and HTML code… Easily and manage custom meta tags to various parts of your site or on individual posts, pages, URL, such as Yahoo and Google verification tags.
sections.installation:
1. Upload echbay-tag-manager folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Go to menu Webgiare Plugins menu and Tag Manager menu in WordPress.
